nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING TO CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING TO CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 4:00 PM CDT Tue Oct 31
 the center of Pilar was located near 11.4, -89.5
 with movement ENE at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
